twoSetSkill.name: Spacetime of Infite Divisibility 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Total DMG +35.0%. Branch attacks inflict [Butterfly] debuff to enemies for 15s(can be refreshed. Every 4 times the enemies with [Butterfly] take damage, it will explode and deal 100.0% ATK of Lightning DMG. (CD: 1.5s)

threeSetSkill.name: End Beyond Reach 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: When [Butterfly] explodes, recovers 2 SP. After triggering ultimate evasion skill, Lightning DMG +60% for 15s against enemies with [Butterfly](can be refreshed).
